import "../styles/App.scss"; import data from "../data/contacts.json"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const oneContact = data[0]; const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const hadleChangeSearch = (ev) => {}; const htmlContactList = data.map((oneContact, index) => {

  • {oneContact.name} {oneContact.lastName}

    {oneContact.phone}

    {oneContact.email}

    • ; }); return (
    {/* header */}

    Mi agenda de contactos

    {/* contact list */}
      {htmlContactList};
    {/* new contact */}

    Añade un nuevo contacto

    ); } export default App;
